name: HAT-API-iOS
summary: Includes all the API calls you will need to communicate and work with HAT.
description: `HAT-FOR-iOS` provides features that make your app to be able to `authenticate` with the HAT, `read/write` to the `HAT`, fetch and setup `Data Plugs` and `Applications`, fetch `Data debits` and use advanced features like `Combinators` and `Bundles`.
